name: 1 Bunny 2 Moons
description:
My first game jam game ever! For GMTK Jam 2019

Theme: Only One

Uses only one button. Press the space bar to jump between moons. Touching a moon changes your color. Touch the balls that match your color to increase your score. Avoid the balls that are not your color. Don't let the bunny reach the top or bottom of the screen when on a moon.

WARNING: If you lose, you need to press ESC to exit and then relaunch the game to try again.
